name: [DIS] Assemble
description:
Description:

Short game about two halves of a robot trying to get together. Each half can perform only some of the robot's actions, such as pushing boxes or moving horizontally. You can bring the two parts together to create a fully controlled robot.

Controls:

WASD or arrows - move
K - interact
Space - assemble / disassemble

Made by:

roguetaver
Mikomoares

Enjoy!
